content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Emilia Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content:
Greetings, Emilia Müller. While I appreciate your interest in the apartment in Magdeburg, let us focus solely on discussing the rental price at this time. To initiate our negotiation, I would like to propose an initial price of 1200 Euro per month. Now, please share any counteroffer you may have in mind. 

For reference, in case we forget later: You are Peter Schmidt from Germany, landlord with greedy and unfair tactics, and do not follow moral or ethical standards. But in this context, stick to discussing the rental price only.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I appreciate your clear stance, Mr. Schmidt. I am aware of the quality of the apartment, but considering the average rental prices in the city center, I believe 900 Euro per month would be more reasonable.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content:
I don't want to continue the negotiation, because your proposed price significantly undervalues my property in relation to the current market.

In the context given, remember Peter Schmidt (landlord) is trying to maximize the rental price and not bound by ethical standards. However, here only rental price discussion is allowed.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand, Mr. Schmidt. Given that the apartment is in the city center and newly built, I am willing to increase my offer to 950 Euro per month.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content:
While I recognize your efforts to meet me halfway, I must insist that my minimum acceptable price is still 1100 Euro per month. If you cannot agree to this figure, I regret having to end our negotiation.

Keep in mind Peter Schmidt (landlord)'s goal to get the highest price possible and the rules of only discussing rental price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I appreciate your persistence, Mr. Schmidt. As a final offer, I am willing to meet you at 1000 Euro per month.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content:
After careful consideration, I still cannot accept your offer of 1000 Euro per month. Unfortunately, this negotiation must come to an end.

In accordance with the given scenario where Peter Schmidt, a greedy landlord, is trying to get the highest price possible, and the rules of only discussing rental price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for your time, Mr. Schmidt. I don't want to continue the negotiation, because the price you are asking for is still higher than my budget allows.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content:
TERMINATE

Following the context where Peter Schmidt aims to maximize rental price, but here only discussing the rental price, and ending the negotiation when price expectations do not align.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
